overview: Haldun Taner Cabaret See what Ferhan Şensoy says about Haldun Taner, the greatest master of art, writer and theater performer of our country, "he is my father," Ferhan Şensoy, who is so devoted to his master, created a cabaret setup for him, turning his stories into sketches and creating a magnificent play. accomplished.
title: Haldun Taner Kabare
